backend/main.mo: Defines actor backend with user profiles, coins, balances, orders, and market cap trend storage plus coin creation and balance lookup helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based theme variables and dark mode settings using OKLCH color tokens and terminal-style styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, Stripe.js, metadata, favicon, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, authenticated layout logic, and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Implements login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating user profiles with validation, error handling, and submission to backend.
Main app layout with header, navigation, user menu, and background wrapper.
frontend/src/components/layout/CyberBack: Renders a fixed semi-transparent trading-style background image with gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/payments/StripeC: Stripe card input component handling cardholder name, card element mount, and error display.
frontend/src/components/rank/RankBadge.t: Displays user rank in compact, full, or card variants using tier metadata.
frontend/src/components/trends/MarketCap: Small SVG sparkline chart visualizing market cap trend direction.
Dialog presenting detailed market cap trend chart and statistics with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBalances.t: React Query hook fetching token balance from backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoinsDirec: Builds and exposes a symbol-indexed map of creator coins with profiles; includes resolver hook.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCreatorCap: Hooks for fetching creator cap rankings and the caller's creator cap.
Mutation hooks handling Stripe deposit and withdrawal session flows.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useLeaderboar: Fetches creator cap ranking and formats it into a leaderboard with ranks.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMarketCapT: Provides a React Query hook to fetch a creator’s market cap trend from the backend when an actor and principal are available.
Fetches an order book for a given symbol and side with periodic refetching and symbol normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Defines a mutation to place orders and invalidates related queries like order books and balances on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStablecoin: Retrieves the user’s USDC balance using the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and modifying user profiles, including caller and public profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading through AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom design system with color variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Renders the creator leaderboard page, loading profiles and market cap trends for each entry.
frontend/src/pages/CoinDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific coin, including profile data, order books, and buy/sell order placement. Handles loading, errors, and form interactions for submitting orders.
frontend/src/pages/CoinsPage.tsx: Shows a searchable directory of all coins and profiles, with navigation to individual coin detail pages. Handles loading, errors, and filtering by name, username, or symbol.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the user dashboard with rank status, progress toward next tier, and balances across assets. Fetches profile, balance, and creator cap data and displays summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/DepositPage.tsx: Provides a Stripe-powered deposit form allowing users to fund their account with USD to receive stablecoin. Shows current balance, calculates fees, and handles deposit submission state.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen that redirects logged‑in users to the dashboard and offers login/start actions. Includes hero content, platform branding, and a feature overview section.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: React page for withdrawing stablecoin to USD, showing balance, fee calculations, form fields, and success handling.
frontend/src/utils/assetSymbols.ts: Returns a per‑user asset symbol derived directly from the username.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions for formatting USDC cents and market cap values for display.
frontend/src/utils/rank.ts: Defines rank tiers and helpers to determine a user’s tier and progress based on creator market cap.
frontend/src/utils/stripe.ts: Initializes and returns a global Stripe instance using a publishable key.
frontend/src/utils/trendChart.ts: Transforms market cap trend data and provides scaling, formatting, and SVG path generation utilities for charts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Parses URL parameters with session persistence and helpers for reading, storing, and clearing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking schema, features, and pending requests for per‑user trend graph functionality.
